title: Rustkit
summary: Rustkit is an SDK for building applications on the Ergo blockchain. The goal is to create a library that provides a simple and easy-to-use interface for developers to build applications. The library is currently in the early stages of development and is not recommended for production use.

qa_pairs.question: What is Rustkit?
qa_pairs.answer: Rustkit is a SDK for building applications on the Ergo blockchain.

qa_pairs.question: What is the goal of Rustkit?
qa_pairs.answer: The goal of Rustkit is to create a library that provides a simple and easy to use interface for developers to build applications on the Ergo blockchain.

qa_pairs.question: What is the current stage of Rustkit development?
qa_pairs.answer: Rustkit is currently in the early stages of development and is not recommended for production use.

qa_pairs.question: Where can Rustkit be found?
qa_pairs.answer: Rustkit can be found on the crates.io platform at the URL https://crates.io/crates/ergo-rustkit.

qa_pairs.question: What is the Ergo blockchain?
qa_pairs.answer: The Ergo blockchain is the blockchain platform that Rustkit is built to support.

sections.heading: Rustkit
sections.content:
> A SDK for building applications on the Ergo blockchain. Our goal is to create a library that creates a simple and easy to use interface for developers to build applications. Currently, the library is in the early stages of development and is not recommended for production use.

[crates.io/crates/ergo-rustkit](https://crates.io/crates/ergo-rustkit)
